Package com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CreditCardService
    The interface for performing creditcard requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCreditCardService
    Sends an HTTPS POST request to the SALT POST API.
    AbstractReceipt
    The receipt returned from processing a gateway request.
    AdvancedRiskProfile
    For now, each field is split up into a semantic grouping.
    AdvancedRiskProfile.Builder  
    ApprovalInfo
    The info upon approval.
    AvsResponse
    A value object containing the results of AVS.
    CreditCard
    A creditcard for making creditcard purchases.
    CreditCardReceipt
    The receipt returned from processing a creditcard request.
    CustomerProfile
    A customer profile.
    Cvv2Response
    A value object containing the results of cvv2 verification.
    DebitCardReceipt
    The receipt returned from processing a debitcard request.
    HttpsCreditCardService
    The implementation of the CreditCardService that issues creditcard requests through https.
    HttpsDebitCardService
    Builds the server calls for debit card transactions (purchase, refund, and batch close)
    LodgingRequest
    Not implemented at this time.
    Merchant
    A threadsafe, immutable value object representing a Merchant.
    PaymentProfile
    An object containing a customer's CreditCard and CustomerProfile
    PeriodicPurchaseInfo
    Periodic Purchase Info
    PeriodicPurchaseInfo.Schedule
    Schedule = type + interval length)
    PurchaseCardRequest
    Not used at this time.
    StorageReceipt
    The receipt returned from processing a secure storage request.
    TransactionResponse
    Returned after any call to the Gateway.
    USDebitCard
    Not used at this time.
    Utils
    Contains utility methods.
    VerificationRequest
    A value object requesting that the CreditCard be verified by indicating the creditcard elements, such as AVS and CVV2, that should be verified.

    AdvancedRiskProfile.ShippingType  
    AdvancedRiskProfile.TransactionSource  
    AvsRequest
    Requests that AVS should be performed.
    CreditCardIndicator
    Requests that CVV2 should be verified.

    Requests that CVV2 should be verified.
    HttpsDebitCardService.RequestCode  
    LodgingRequest.ExtraCharge  
    LodgingRequest.Field  
    LodgingRequest.Type  
    MarketSegment
    The possible market segments for a transaction.
    PeriodicPurchaseInfo.ExecutionType  
    PeriodicPurchaseInfo.ScheduleType
    ScheduleType = monthly, weekly, daily etc
    PeriodicPurchaseInfo.State
    State of the Periodic Purchase, not to be confused with state of any associated transactions.
    USDebitCard.AccountType  
    USDebitCard.Field  
    USDebitCard.KeyPTR  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResponseProcessingException
    Indicates that the request data may have already been processed, but there was an error retrieving or interpreting the response.
